languages.text: "Проклятые ксеносы обрушились на нас поздней ночью, перебили три отряда блюстителей! Пришлось отступать в леса. А Эрдриг... я понял, что он не выжил, когда проклятый лес вновь сомкнулся за нашими спинами".

"The accursed xenos fell upon us late at night and slaughtered three enforcer squads! We had to retreat into the woods. As for Aerdrig... I knew he didn't make it when the damned forest closed behind us again."
languages.original_text: "Проклятые ксеносы обрушились на нас поздней ночью, перебили три отряда блюстителей! Пришлось отступать в леса. А Эрдриг... я понял, что он не выжил, когда проклятый лес вновь сомкнулся за нашими спинами".

traits.locale_text: "The accursed xenos fell upon us late at night and slaughtered three Enforcer squads! We had to retreat into the woods. As for Aerdrig... I knew he didn't make it when the damned forest closed behind our backs again."

"The accursed xenos fell upon us late at night and slaughtered three Enforcer squads! We had to retreat into the woods. As for Aerdrig... I knew he didn't make it when the damned forest closed behind our backs again."

"The accursed xenos fell upon us late at night and slaughtered three Enforcer squads! We had to retreat into the woods. As for Aerdrig... I knew he didn't make it when the damned forest closed behind our backs again."

"The accursed xenos fell upon us late at night and slaughtered three Enforcer squads! We had to retreat into the woods. As for Aerdrig... I knew he didn't make it when the damned forest closed behind our backs again."

"The accursed xenos fell upon us late at night and slaughtered three enforcer squads! We had to retreat into the woods. As for Aerdrig... I knew he didn't make it when the damned forest closed behind us again."

"The accursed xenos fell upon us late at night and slaughtered three enforcer squads! We had to retreat into the woods. As for Aerdrig... I knew he didn't make it when the damned forest closed behind us again."

languages.text: “那些该死的异形在深夜袭击了我们，屠杀了整整三支执法者小队！我们不得不撤退到森林里。至于艾德瑞格……当那片森林该死的道路在我们背后消失的时候，我就知道他死定了。”
languages.original_text: "The accursed xenos fell upon us late at night and slaughtered three enforcer squads! We had to retreat into the woods. As for Aerdrig... I knew he didn't make it when the damned forest closed behind us again."

traits.locale_text: “那些该死的异形在深夜袭击了我们，屠杀了整整三支执法者小队！我们不得不撤退到森林里。至于艾德瑞格……当那片森林该死的道路在我们背后消失的时候，我就知道他死定了。”

languages.text: "Die verfluchten Xenos haben uns spät nachts überfallen und drei Enforcer-Trupps abgeschlachtet! Wir mussten uns in die Wälder zurückziehen. Und was Aerdrig angeht ... Ich wusste, dass er es nicht geschafft hatte, als sich der verdammte Wald hinter uns wieder geschlossen hat."
languages.original_text: "The accursed xenos fell upon us late at night and slaughtered three enforcer squads! We had to retreat into the woods. As for Aerdrig... I knew he didn't make it when the damned forest closed behind us again."

traits.locale_text: "Die verfluchten Xenos haben uns spät nachts überfallen und drei Enforcer-Trupps abgeschlachtet! Wir mussten uns in die Wälder zurückziehen. Und was Aerdrig angeht ... Ich wusste, dass er es nicht geschafft hatte, als sich der verdammte Wald hinter unseren Rücken wieder geschlossen hat."

languages.text: «¡Los malditos xenos se lanzaron sobre nosotros a altas horas de la noche y masacraron tres escuadras enteras de guardias! Tuvimos que retirarnos al bosque. En cuanto a Aerdrig... supe que no había sobrevivido cuando el condenado bosque volvió a cerrarse detrás de nosotros».
languages.original_text: "The accursed xenos fell upon us late at night and slaughtered three enforcer squads! We had to retreat into the woods. As for Aerdrig... I knew he didn't make it when the damned forest closed behind us again."

traits.locale_text: «¡Los malditos xenos se lanzaron sobre nosotros a altas horas de la noche y masacraron tres escuadras enteras de guardias! Tuvimos que retirarnos al bosque. En cuanto a Aerdrig... supe que no había sobrevivido cuando el condenado bosque volvió a cerrarse detrás de nosotros».

languages.text: « Ces maudits xénos nous sont tombés dessus tard dans la nuit et ont massacré trois escouades de prévôts ! Nous avons dû battre en retraite dans les bois. Quant à Aerdrig... j'ai su qu'il n'avait pas survécu quand cette forêt de malheur s'est refermée derrière nous. »
languages.original_text: "The accursed xenos fell upon us late at night and slaughtered three enforcer squads! We had to retreat into the woods. As for Aerdrig... I knew he didn't make it when the damned forest closed behind us again."

traits.locale_text: « Ces maudits xénos nous sont tombés dessus tard dans la nuit et ont massacré trois escouades de prévôts ! Nous avons dû battre en retraite dans les bois. Quant à Aerdrig... J'ai su qu'il n'avait pas survécu quand cette forêt de malheur s'est refermée derrière nous. »

languages.text: 「呪われたゼノが深夜我々に襲いかかり、3つのエンフォーサー分隊を虐殺した！我々は森に退却せざるを得なかった。エアドリグは…彼は間に合わなかった。私たちの背後で再び忌まわしい森が閉ざされたのだ」
languages.original_text: "The accursed xenos fell upon us late at night and slaughtered three enforcer squads! We had to retreat into the woods. As for Aerdrig... I knew he didn't make it when the damned forest closed behind us again."

traits.locale_text: 「呪われたゼノが深夜我々に襲いかかり、3つのエンフォーサー分隊を虐殺した！我々は森に退却せざるを得なかった。エアドリグは…彼は間に合わなかった。私たちの背後で再び忌まわしい森が閉ざされたのだ」

languages.text: "Uğursuz zenolar, gecenin bir vakti üstümüze çullanarak üç infazcı mangasını katletti! Ormana çekilmek zorunda kaldık. Aerdrig konusuna gelirsek... O lanet orman ardımızda kapandığında sağ kalmadığını anladım."
languages.original_text: "The accursed xenos fell upon us late at night and slaughtered three enforcer squads! We had to retreat into the woods. As for Aerdrig... I knew he didn't make it when the damned forest closed behind us again."

traits.locale_text: "Uğursuz zenolar, gecenin bir vakti üstümüze çullanarak üç infazcı mangasını katlettiler! Ormana çekilmek zorunda kaldık. Aerdrig konusuna gelirsek... O lanet orman ardımızda kapandığında sağ kalmadığını anladım."
